en-US.summary: Hear the actual voices of your favorite Office characters!
examplePhrases: Alexa, Open Sounds of the Office.
Alexa, Ask Sounds of the Office for quotes from Jim.
Alexa, Ask Sounds of the Office for more quotes.
en-US.name: Real Quotes from The Office
en-US.description:
Alexa's voice is boring! Hear the funniest quotes from the voices of the actual actors in the hit show, the Office.

Dwight, Jim, Michael, Creed, and the whole gang get together in this hilarious Alexa skill to remind you why Dunder Mifflin is the best place to be.

This skill comes with at least 30 free quotes to hear and tons more bonus quotes. Get ready for lots of new features coming out, like "Vote a Quote" and "Guess the Character".
What are you waiting for!? Give this skill a try.
en-US.updatesDescription:
* Improved Randomization: you will cycle through all the available quotes before hearing repeats.
* You can ask for quotes from specific characters.
* Improved audio quality!
* I keep track of the most popular characters people ask for so I can focus on adding more quotes from them.

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: Open sounds of the office. Ask for quotes. Ask for quotes from a specific character. Ask for bonus content. Ask to refund bonus quotes.
